Let all who decide for Christ be set to work for others who are dead in trespasses and sins. Wherever the truth has been proclaimed and people have been awakened and converted, the believers are at once to unite in exercises of charity. Wherever Bible truth has been presented, a 
                                                                           85
work of practical godliness is to be begun. Wherever a church is established, missionary work is to be done for the helpless and the suffering.
